CustomField.defaultValue: "***EXPLANATORY NOTES***" +BR()+"1. Charge Types: MRC=Monthly Recurring Charge OTC=One Time Charge" +BR()+"2. Offer does not apply to 512K DIA connections or DIA Redundant links" +BR()+"3. Set-up charge of PGK 1000 applies to new Office 365 tenants" +BR()+"4. Digicel must be Digital Partner of Record with Administration rights to the tenant" +BR()+"5. The DIA offer is valid for as long as you have a DIA contract with Digicel PNG" +BR()+"6. Free Office 365 subscriptions revert to list price on termination of DIA contract" +BR()+"7. If Microsoft alter Office 365 list prices Digicel reserve the right to modify the number of free subscriptions per credit"
CustomField.description: This is used to display the DIA free offer terms and conditions on the quote form sent to the customer
CustomField.label: Quote Note Office 365
